CustomField.description: If checked, the "Email Domain(s)" field on account will be "locked" and the field will not be updated. If email domains are present in the "Email Domain(s)" field, leads will still match to the account and leads will still auto-convert to the account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the "Email Domain(s)" field on account will be "locked" and the field will not be updated. If email domains are present in the "Email Domain(s)" field, leads will still match to the account and leads will still auto-convert to the account.
CustomField.label: Lock Account
